TopicTitle: [1.5] KOOSE mini reentry pod aka escape pod

Articles.Content:
18 minutes ago, TiktaalikDreaming said:

  If I *CAN* get it as a thing that you unpack and then use as an external command seat, that would be awesome. 

Good luck. It seems the best way.

Currently testing a version that seems to have the capability of becoming an external command seat after deploying via KIS.  I can't seem to get a backpack plus available as seat inventory though.  But if I mark it as non-carryable, then it is available, and apart from not being worn as a backpack, seems to function.  My first go at RCS placement was hilariously bad though, nasal powered.

Also, I don't think I'm going to be able to add a parachute.  Parachutes are always separate parts in KSP due to how they function.  So this may always require a Gagarin landing.

Edited March 15, 2020 by TiktaalikDreaming

Personally have been unable to use the "inflatable pod" yet. the RCS thrusters seem to only induce rotation, can't control in the least and about the Gagarin landing, I don't see how you can even exit the pod. Will try again with the default astronaut suit, maybe that messed something up? IDK.

On 3/16/2020 at 12:32 AM, TiktaalikDreaming said:

So this may always require a Gagarin landing.

Not this Gagarin I hope

May be Kerbal would be able to use own Parachute inside this Seat...

It seems no aerodynamic glider.

10 hours ago, Sebra said:

Not this Gagarin I hope

May be Kerbal would be able to use own Parachute inside this Seat...

It seems no aerodynamic glider.

Not *that* Gagarin, no.  Although, if a spin starts up, the effect may be similar.

The original plan was a chest mounted parachute pack.  I might have a look at a second KIIS parachute.  You can't activate the kerbanaut's chute when in an external command chair.  

There's a nice write up of the MOOSE as the number 1 in this count down that captures the essential qualities https://www.cracked.com/article_19545_6-terrifying-emergency-escape-pods-that-arent-worth-it.html

Yes. I know Yuriy landed on own parachute.

Is "crush up foam" doable? You may be able to increase impact tolerance. And buoyancy. And viscosity.

I want as well such emergency rocket extinguisher engine as KIS usable tool. Doubt it is possible.

What parameters of EVA Kerbal can KIS object change except appearance?

On 4/7/2020 at 2:07 AM, Sebra said:

What parameters of EVA Kerbal can KIS object change except appearance?

I really have no idea.  This is the first time I've messed with it, and I'm basing my "knowledge" on what does or doesn't function in game.  And what options there are in the config files of course.
Very cute stuff, I've been looking for a rescue capsule for quite some time. Thanks.
Could you make a colonization/exploration version of this? Maybe a configurable koose nest, because 6 pods lags my ships sometimes.
Is anyone still maintaining this?
Does this work for KSP 1.12.2?

On 9/28/2021 at 5:44 AM, Rakete said:

Does this work for KSP 1.12.2?

To be honest, I don't know.  Haven't started up KSP in a while.  It probably doesn't take long to test.
It's up to you now @Rakete, since you took the cat out of the bag. Install it, test it and let us know!

Hi, it seems there is something wrong with the dimensions of the KOOSE chute. If attached to the pod the vessel size jumps from 0.6m/1.2m/1.2m to 23m/10.5m/10.5m (H/W/L) which means that you can't use the pod and chute without upgrading the launchpad first.

Edit: Apart from that everything seems to work fine in 1.12.2

Edited October 27, 2021 by CreepyShadow
I seem to be unable to place the lifeboat into the inventory of a capsule though (1.12.2)

17 hours ago, BlueTiger12 said:

I seem to be unable to place the lifeboat into the inventory of a capsule though (1.12.2)

With
  

@PART[ExternalReEntryPack]:NEEDS[KOOSE]:AFTER[KOOSE]
{
  MODULE
  {
    name = ModuleCargoPart
    packedVolume = 15
  }
}

within a .cfg file in the GameData folder, i am at least able to put the lifeboat in the inventory of a capsule in the VAB again.
Didn't test, if everything else works though.

Tested a little bit, but either i am too stupid for it, or it doesn't work correctly. I was not able to deploy it, as i don't get any options in the context menu, when i have it on a kerbal.

Edited November 25, 2021 by BlueTiger12

On 11/25/2021 at 11:19 PM, BlueTiger12 said:

I was not able to deploy it, as i don't get any options in the context menu, when i have it on a kerbal.

I was able to deploy it, but not able to board it. You can deploy it after placing it.

I'm a bit late, but I've had some issues with deploying the ELK. I have KIS and everything (fairly new to KIS so no idea how to do most of it) but I don't get anything in the context menu or KIS inventory area that suggests I could inflate it. Is there something I'm doing wrong or is it a bug? Do need help, Bob is currently burning up with ELK equipped 

Okay, so I found a thing. I placed it, but now I can't board it. Great!

I GOT IT! Bob's going for a proper reentry now, let's hope... 

Hm. It appears that bob is overheating with the thing deployed on his back. Ablator is draining, but he's overheating and I have to use his RCS fuel to rotate him to remove heat. He'll run out of RCS fuel before the reentry gets to the worst part, and it's already getting deadly at the weakest area of reentry... 50 KM periapsis from the default 86 or so KM orbit in the set orbit cheat. Seems pretty unsafe!

Okay, problem solved. It doesn't reach a temperature above about 3 quarters, but that caught me off guard there
Landed. Works fine, thanks! 10/10 mod.
